features: 【High-caliber Quality & Sturdy Construction】The shoe storage cabinet adopts waterproof and durable MDF,painting treatment of exterior surface, which is easy to wipe.It's a perfect size shoe cabinet for every home space.

【Perfect design 】 This top design, front pattern design, and triangular golden handle design make our product better integrated into modern or medieval homes Its compact footprint makes this the perfect storage space if you’re living with a smaller space. It is exactly what you needed to clean up Shoes , and what you wanted aesthetically.

【MORE STORAGE SPACE】This multifunctional shoe rack with flip drawers,The compartment in the middle of each flip drawer can be removed or adjusted to fit different shoe heights. The top platform is spacious enough to place small items. And Shoes can be placed in the shoe storage device, providing more storage space and effectively isolating dust

【Easy to Assemble, Clear Instruction】All parts and accessories are numbered, and each step of the installation has detailed instructions, easy to understand and to assemble.We also have assembly videos for your reference
【RELIABLE SERVICE】 If you have any product problems, please contact us in time, all problems will be solved

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute and functional but small
reviews.reviewText: Adorable and functional shoe storage. It is small and better suited for ladies shoes, but it looks great and it is relatively simple to put together.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I wish I had this sooner
reviews.reviewText: It's does well in my entry way, keeping things tidy and keeping my puppy from our shoes. Awesome product 👌

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Pretty but may not last long
reviews.reviewText: Hard to assemble, but looked beautiful when it was done. Organizes shoes well (you can actually keep 6 pairs of adult shoes in each unit). We got two shoe storage units and placed them side by side and it looks really pretty in our mudroom. The white wood is clean and modern and the handle looks nice. The issue is the cushions move around, but our shoe racks are backed against the wall, so it’s not a big deal. We were happy for the first few months and were pretty gentle opening/closing the door, BUT after 3 months of use, one of the shoe racks fell apart and can’t be fixed- a screw came out and the whole screw track within the wood is destroyed. I tried to fix it but it’s a few millimeters off since the hole is bigger and now the door doesn’t open and close properly. It’s a shame that we only got 3 months out of it for that price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewText: No manual came with product. Unable to put together

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 24, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The joibabe Shoe Cabinet with 2 Flip Drawers is a stylish and practical solution for organizing footwear. The free-standing design with tipping bucket shoe rack organizer makes accessing and storing shoes a breeze. The two flip drawers add a neat touch, keeping shoes out of sight and creating a clutter-free space. The cabinet's sleek aesthetic and functional design make it a valuable addition to any home, offering a tidy and convenient storage solution for shoes. Joibabe has crafted a winning combination of style and organization with this shoe cabinet.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Very difficult shoe cabinet to assemble but the result decluttered our foyer and works for us
reviews.reviewText: Update: several months later, we're updating this review to add a star — because although this shoe cabinet was arduous and extremely frustrating to assemble, once we figured out how to put it together, the cabinet has served well to declutter our foyer. Several months later, the cabinet is still in good working order after being used several times daily. We love how it freed up space in our foyer and we like the way it blends in with white doors and door trim. The organizational configuration served to streamline and simplify our shoe removal and organization process. We have greater appreciation for this shoe cabinet since adding undercabinet lighting, as shown in our review images. We also swapped out the cheaper handles for copper handles. And we added contact paper inside, making it easier to clean when the shoe soles are dirty.Originally, we'd complained that there are soooo many pieces and parts to assemble this MDF flip-drawer shoe cabinet. The installation instructions are absolutely horrible and impossible to understand. The tiny font is difficult to see, as are the tiny icons used in the instructions. It took two college-educated senior citizens two hours to assemble the two-drawer shoe cabinet, using a Phillips head screwdriver and lots of patience. Fortunately, one of us is a carpenter’s daughter, so we figured it out on our own. During the assembly process, we discovered several flaws in the design and manufacturing (incompletely pre-drilled holes; gaps in alignment of panels and rails). As shown in our images, we did not use the drawer handles provided; we substituted with our own leather handles. We are happy we were able to put this together because we do like how this shoe cabinet helped to declutter our foyer. Now we can find our shoes quickly and no one’s tripping over them strewn around the door anymore. (TIP: We added magnetic, motion-sensor light bars to the interior undersides.)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Keeps shoes safe from our dog
reviews.reviewText: This was so easy to assemble and I love how sturdy it is and it’s a great quality! I love that our shoes are stored away from my dog who gets shoes and takes them all over the house
